summary: The package provides a collection of pytest test suites that validate Prefect’s push provisioners for multiple cloud platforms (Google Cloud Run, Azure Container Instances, AWS Elastic Container Service, and Modal). The tests mock the respective CLI/SDK interactions, verify credential block handling, resource creation, role assignments, error detection, idempotent behavior, and interactive user prompts, ensuring the provisioners operate correctly under various scenarios.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and robustness of Prefect’s infrastructure provisioning tools across supported cloud providers, enabling reliable automated deployment and reducing regression risk in production environments.
